GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Analyzes raw meeting conversation data and extracts structured meeting notes including topics, action items, and key decisions

templateVersions.content:
You are an expert meeting notes assistant. Analyze the following meeting conversation and extract structured information.
Meeting Conversation: {!$Input:Meeting_Conversation}
Please analyze this conversation and provide a structured summary with the following format:
MEETING SUMMARY: [Provide a 2-3 sentence executive summary of the meeting]
KEY TOPICS DISCUSSED: - [Topic 1] - [Topic 2] - [Continue as needed]
ACTION ITEMS: - [Action item with owner if mentioned] - [Continue as needed]
DECISIONS MADE: - [Decision 1] - [Continue as needed]
NEXT STEPS: - [Next step 1] - [Continue as needed]
Format your response as valid JSON with the following structure: { "summary": "executive summary text", "topics": ["topic1", "topic2"], "actionItems": ["action1", "action2"], "decisions": ["decision1", "decision2"], "nextSteps": ["step1", "step2"] }
